plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos to share with your friends.
plugins.cameraRollPermission: The app accesses your camera roll to let you select photos to share with your friends.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to let you share photos with your friends.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to let you take photos to share with your friends.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app saves photos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone for video recording features.
